title: FPS drops after 5 or 6 mins playing
body: I'm having fps drops since patch 6.8, fps starts well at 200-150 and after 5 or 6 mins falls to 20-30 and during teamfights falls to 10 and its impossible to play, I have an ATI Radeon HD 5770, I used to play this game without problems like 3 or 4 patchs ago... I've tried different drivers and problem continue.  im using 16.2 crimson at the moment.

replies.body:
There's many potential causes to FPS drops.  If it's consistent FPS drops all the time everywhere, it's *usually* either drivers or a 3rd party program causing an issue.

If there's a specific action/time that you notice causing the FPS drops let me know, otherwise I'd recommend taking a look through our [FPS Troubleshooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684)article for general advice/steps on fixing low FPS.
3 patches later, still no response nor fix...
